source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spells.description:
Equip: When damaged below 40% maximum health, scatter 6 mines randomly around you for 8 sec. Enemies who step on these mines will suffer 880,373 Fire damage and be slowed by 70% for 4 sec.

An enemy can only detonate 1 mine per emergency. Can only occur once every 2 min.

Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 378 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

name: Noggenfogger Ultimate Deluxe

spells.description: Use: Summons a Blackwater Pirate to aid you in combat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: With an elixir as unpredictable as Noggenfogger's, you never know if to expect pirates or confusion.

spells.description: Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
